name: Exoterrestrial
description:
Take on the role of a lone astronaut venturing from planet to planet between mysterious slipgates. Enjoy different musical and graphical themes, as well as some minor puzzles as you progress through the worlds.

Exoterrestrial is a game inspired by this game jam's theme, and started out as a small sample test. I began developing it late, about 5-6 days after the jam started, and over time, I added more and more to it all the way up until the submission date.

It's a small demo of a walking-simulator/exploration game where you take the role of an astronaut travelling from planet to planet between slipgates. Since the theme was 'A Different Planet', I thought of travelling to a different planet for each level of the game. 

Credits:

Programming  by https://mark-kawucha.itch.io/

Art  by https://bearson.itch.io/ and  https://mark-kawucha.itch.io/

Music by https://soundcloud.com/kami-oh

Royalty-free sound obtained from freesound.org

Royalty-free font obtained from dafont.com
